column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A group of suspects left a drink shop and fired gunshots at 11 pm on Saturday
column6: less than 150 meters from the administrative police headquarters of Sangkat Teuk Laak II
column8: Phnom Penh.------Sources said that before the incident
column9: a group of suspects had been sitting around the shop. As soon as the suspect came out of the store
column10: he pulled out a gun and fired several shots
column11: causing panic. Fortunately no one was injured. ------The men immediately fled the scene.------After the incident
column12: local authorities arrived at the scene and collected bullet casings and asked the shop owner to identify the suspect. ------POST NEWS
